module.title: feudar
feudar
module.p: feudar must is used in a couple of modal constructions of necessity.

ul.li:
present –
’S fheudar dhi sgur.
She has to stop. td. 185
’S fheudar dhomh fhìn a bhith gabhail dhachaigh dìreach.
I must be getting straight home. td. 185
Is fheudar dhomh an t-each a reic.
I must sell the horse. td. 297

past –
B’ fheudar dhi sgur.
She had to stop. td. 185
B’ fheudar dha an dùthaich fhàgail.
He had to leave the country. td, 297
B’ fheudar dhi togail a-mach a chosnadh airgid.
She had to go out to earn money. td. 297

lix.gd: Bheir mi seòladh dhut mas fheudar.
lix.tr: I’ll give you directions if need be.
